Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by New Jersey in 1985...
Injured on 7/8/1985 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/12/1985, off Everette Johnson (BC)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Toledo on 8/27/1985...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1989, hitting .364 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Capital City on 5/27/1990...
Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 8/23/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Diablo on 2/22/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
